data.name: Pérez entradas
data.desc: On two entradas, Capt. Pérez reduces recently rebelled towns of Chanlacan to its former location, and Uatibil, Holpachay, Holzuz to new locations, and thereafter, on three entradas, attempts to reduce Tipuj and its adjacent towns, but mostly fails
data.locn: Pacha [Bacalar-in-Pacha], Chanlacan, Uatibil, Chunhuhub, Holpachay, Holzuz, Chunukum
data.agents_sp: Gov Pedro Saenz Izquierdo, Capt Francisco Pérez 6 Sp 15 Ma / later 10 Sp 60 Ma
data.prim_n: Jones A cap 2 / [missg] [Méritos y servicios de Capitán Francisco Pérez, 1661]
